verses.text: \w Therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w if|strong="G1487"\w* \w you|strong="G1487"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* risen \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w seek|strong="G2212"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G2316"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w above|strong="G0507"\w*; \w where|strong="G3757"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w sitting|strong="G2521"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w right|strong="G1188"\w* \w hand|strong="G1188"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*:

\w Mind|strong="G5426"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G1093"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w above|strong="G0507"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w that|strong="G1093"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w dead|strong="G0599"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w* \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w hid|strong="G2928"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w When|strong="G3752"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w appear|strong="G5319"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, \w then|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w appear|strong="G5319"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*.

Mortify \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w members|strong="G3196"\w* \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*; \w fornication|strong="G4202"\w*, \w uncleanness|strong="G0167"\w*, \w lust|strong="G1939"\w*, \w evil|strong="G2556"\w* concupiscence, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w covetousness|strong="G4124"\w*, \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* service \w of|strong="G1909"\w* idols.

\w For|strong="G1223"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w things|strong="G3739"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w wrath|strong="G3709"\w* \w of|strong="G5207"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* cometh \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* children \w of|strong="G5207"\w* unbelief,

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w walked|strong="G4043"\w* \w some|strong="G3739"\w* \w time|strong="G4218"\w*, \w when|strong="G3753"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w lived|strong="G2198"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G1722"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G1161"\w* \w put|strong="G0659"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* away: \w anger|strong="G3709"\w*, \w indignation|strong="G2372"\w*, \w malice|strong="G2549"\w*, \w blasphemy|strong="G0988"\w*, filthy \w speech|strong="G0148"\w* \w out|strong="G1537"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w mouth|strong="G4750"\w*.

\w Lie|strong="G5574"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*: stripping \w yourselves|strong="G0846"\w* \w of|strong="G0444"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w old|strong="G3820"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w deeds|strong="G4234"\w*,

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* putting \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w new|strong="G3501"\w*, \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w renewed|strong="G0341"\w* unto \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w*, \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w image|strong="G1504"\w* \w of|strong="G2596"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w that|strong="G0846"\w* \w created|strong="G2936"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Where|strong="G3699"\w* \w there|strong="G1762"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w neither|strong="G3756"\w* Gentile \w nor|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jew|strong="G2453"\w*, \w circumcision|strong="G4061"\w* \w nor|strong="G2532"\w* \w uncircumcision|strong="G0203"\w*, \w Barbarian|strong="G0915"\w* \w nor|strong="G2532"\w* \w Scythian|strong="G4658"\w*, bond \w nor|strong="G2532"\w* \w free|strong="G1658"\w*. \w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*.

\w Put|strong="G1746"\w* ye \w on|strong="G3767"\w* \w therefore|strong="G3767"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w elect|strong="G1588"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w holy|strong="G0040"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w beloved|strong="G0025"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* bowels \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w mercy|strong="G3628"\w*, benignity, \w humility|strong="G5012"\w*, modesty, \w patience|strong="G3115"\w*:

\w Bearing|strong="G0430"\w* \w with|strong="G4314"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w forgiving|strong="G5483"\w* \w one|strong="G0240"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w a|strong="G2192"\w* \w complaint|strong="G3437"\w* \w against|strong="G4314"\w* \w another|strong="G0240"\w*: \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* hath \w forgiven|strong="G5483"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w so|strong="G2532"\w* \w do|strong="G2192"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w above|strong="G1909"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* charity, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w bond|strong="G4886"\w* \w of|strong="G1909"\w* perfection:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w let|strong="G1096"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w* \w of|strong="G1520"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* rejoice \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w*, wherein \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w are|strong="G3739"\w* \w called|strong="G2564"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* ye \w thankful|strong="G2170"\w*.

\w Let|strong="G1774"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w dwell|strong="G1774"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w abundantly|strong="G4146"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w*: \w teaching|strong="G1321"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w admonishing|strong="G3560"\w* \w one|strong="G1438"\w* \w another|strong="G1438"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w psalms|strong="G5568"\w*, \w hymns|strong="G5215"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w spiritual|strong="G4152"\w* canticles, \w singing|strong="G0103"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w hearts|strong="G2588"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w All|strong="G3956"\w* whatsoever \w you|strong="G3739"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w or|strong="G2228"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w*, \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G0846"\w*, \w giving|strong="G2168"\w* \w thanks|strong="G2168"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Wives|strong="G1135"\w*, \w be|strong="G2962"\w* \w subject|strong="G5293"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w your|strong="G2962"\w* \w husbands|strong="G0435"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* it behoveth \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w Husbands|strong="G0435"\w*, \w love|strong="G0025"\w* \w your|strong="G0025"\w* \w wives|strong="G1135"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w bitter|strong="G4087"\w* towards \w them|strong="G0846"\w*.

\w Children|strong="G5043"\w*, \w obey|strong="G5219"\w* \w your|strong="G2962"\w* \w parents|strong="G1118"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3778"\w*: \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w well|strong="G1063"\w* \w pleasing|strong="G2101"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w Fathers|strong="G3962"\w*, \w provoke|strong="G2042"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w your|strong="G3588"\w* \w children|strong="G5043"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* indignation, \w lest|strong="G3361"\w* \w they|strong="G3962"\w* \w be|strong="G5043"\w* discouraged.

\w Servants|strong="G1401"\w*, \w obey|strong="G5219"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w your|strong="G2962"\w* \w masters|strong="G2962"\w* \w according|strong="G2596"\w* \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w not|strong="G3361"\w* serving \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* eye, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* pleasing \w men|strong="G3956"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w simplicity|strong="G0572"\w* \w of|strong="G2962"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, \w fearing|strong="G5399"\w* God.

Whatsoever \w you|strong="G3739"\w* \w do|strong="G4160"\w*, \w do|strong="G4160"\w* \w it|strong="G4160"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w heart|strong="G5590"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w men|strong="G0444"\w*:

\w Knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w you|strong="G3754"\w* \w shall|strong="G2962"\w* \w receive|strong="G0618"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w reward|strong="G0469"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w inheritance|strong="G2817"\w*. \w Serve|strong="G1398"\w* ye \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* doth \w wrong|strong="G0091"\w*, \w shall|strong="G2532"\w* \w receive|strong="G2865"\w* \w for|strong="G1063"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w done|strong="G0091"\w* wrongfully: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w there|strong="G1510"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* respect \w of|strong="G3588"\w* persons \w with|strong="G2532"\w* God.
